title: (Weds Part 2) Amy Wants to Hire a Cat Psychic…and A Caller Who Communicates with the Dead
itunes:title: (Weds Part 2) Amy Wants to Hire a Cat Psychic…and A Caller Who Communicates with the Dead
description:
Amy reveals that she wants to hire a psychic to communicate with her cat over the phone. We think she’s falling for a big scam...but then listener Carolyn calls in after that segment and reveals she can communicate with the dead. She tells us how this gift started and how it works.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
